00025 namespace DdMd
00026 {
00027 
00028    using namespace Util;
00029 
00030    /*
00031    * Constructor.
00032    */
00033    DiagnosticFactory::DiagnosticFactory(Simulation& simulation)
00034     : simulationPtr_(&simulation)
00035    {}
00036 
00037    /* 
00038    * Return a pointer to an instance of Diagnostic subclass className.
00039    */
00040    Diagnostic* DiagnosticFactory::factory(const std::string &className) const
00041    {
00042       Diagnostic* ptr = 0;
00043 
00044       // Try subfactories first (if any)
00045       //ptr = trySubfactories(className);
00046       //if (ptr) return ptr;
00047 
00048       // Simulation Diagnostics
00049       if (className == "WriteConfig") {
00050          ptr = new WriteConfig(simulation());
00051       } else 
00052       if (className == "OutputEnergy") {
00053          ptr = new OutputEnergy(simulation());
00054       } else 
00055       if (className == "OutputPressure") {
00056          ptr = new OutputPressure(simulation());
00057       } else
00058       if (className == "OutputBoxdim") {
00059          ptr = new OutputBoxdim(simulation());
00060       } else
00061       if (className == "OutputTemperature") {
00062          ptr = new OutputTemperature(simulation());
00063       } else
00064       if (className == "OutputPairEnergies") {
00065          ptr = new OutputPairEnergies(simulation());
00066       } else
00067       if (className == "StructureFactor") {
00068          ptr = new StructureFactor(simulation());
00069       } else
00070       if (className == "StructureFactorGrid") {
00071          ptr = new StructureFactorGrid(simulation());
00072       }
00073       return ptr;
00074    }
00075 
00076 }
00077 #endif
